items.title: Work in progress.
items.content_html:
This is a Work in Progress #

The aim of this blog is to be very fast and lean, leading to very high performances.
It's written in Visual Studio Code, rendered via a Static Site Generator eleventy, built via npm, pushed to a public github repo, hosted via GitHub pages, and cached by Cloudflare CND.
There will never be any advertisement or bloatware.

I hope I'll able to share with you information that is helping you somehow reach your goals!
